sourcesContent:
{{myProduct.title | uppercase}}

{{myProduct.description}}

Plusieurs tailles disponibles

{{value | currency: 'EUR'}}

{{myProduct.likes}} ♦

{{myProduct.date | date:'EEEE d MMMM y' }}

import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product.model'; import { Size } from '../models/size.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-card', templateUrl: `./product-card.component.html`, styles: [] }) export class ProductCardComponent { @Input() myProduct!: Product; value: number = 3000; SizeSelected(e: any) { this.value = e.target.value; } onAddLike() { if (this.myProduct.isLiked == false) { this.myProduct.likes++; this.myProduct.isLiked = true; } else { this.myProduct.likes--; this.myProduct.isLiked = false; } } cartItemCount: number = 0; addToCart() { } addToCart() { this.cartItemCount++; console.log("Produit ajouté au panier :", this.myProduct); } }
